body: tl;dr. but why did this suddenly turn from sexual predator isekai to fighting evil spirits isekai? it doesn't fit at all. also killing off characters so casually just by a mention is terrible writing. what is the author smoking?
Hey atleast this got a good ending. Better than those "suicidal or death" ending
